title: pylie
description: Data processing and model training for LIE based binding affinity prediction

inlierFilterMethod.description: Filter method for selecting inlier coulomb/VdW energy pairs

lie_vdw_header.description: MD file data header representing the LIE Van der Waals energy term

lie_ele_header.description: MD file data header representing the LIE Coulomb energy term

case.description: Case ID for the collected energy trajectories

filter_stable_trajectory.description: Detect and filter stable regions in the MD energy trajectory

do_filter.description: Filter the MDFrame for detected stable regions

do_plot.description: Make plots of the detected stable regions

fftfreq.description: Filter frequencies higher than X. The higher the number, the more bumps.

gradco.description: Gradient cutoff: if value higher than X, the gradient is high enough, there is a change.

gradcl.description: Clean 0.1*length from start and end (0 means no cleaning, recommended. Only use with FFTfreq ~5 and lower).

minlength.description: Minimal length of stable data (in datapoints, not time!).

doublespline.description: Perform double spline fitting on FFT output (recommended)

splinesmooth.description: Smoothness of the spline (low is smoother, 0 gives the orig data back).
